titleStmt.title: The duty and obligations of serving God a sermon preach'd before the Queen at White-hall, July xxix, 1694 / by Christopher Wyvill ...
titleStmt.author: Wyvill, Christopher, 1651?-1711.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Warren for Walter Kettilby ...,

notesStmt.note: Running title: A sermon preached before the Queen.
Contains half-title page with title: The Dean of Ripon's sermon before the Queen, July xxix, 1694.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
